title: 'Will be fighting directly with Russia if ...': Putin's stark warning to West
content: Vladimir Putin warned that if Ukraine is allowed to use Western long-range missiles against Russian territory, it would mean direct involvement of Nato countries in the conflict. He emphasized that this decision would change the nature of the war and force Russia to take appropriate measures, highlighting Nato's role in missile targeting support.
summary: Vladimir Putin warned that if Ukraine is allowed to use Western long-range missiles against Russian territory, it would mean direct involvement of Nato countries in the conflict. He emphasized that this decision would change the nature of the war and force Russia to take appropriate measures, highlighting Nato's role in missile targeting support.

title: Kamala Harris' reaction to Trumpâ€™s Taliban comments sparks viral debate: Was she about to curse?
content: Vice President Kamala Harris was caught on video nearly cursing former President Donald Trump during a debate, leading to a flurry of social media reactions. The incident occurred as Harris criticized Trump's controversial 2019 invitation to Taliban leaders for peace talks at Camp David, bypassing the Afghan government. Her visible frustration became a focal point for online discussions.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris was caught on video nearly cursing former President Donald Trump during a debate, leading to a flurry of social media reactions. The incident occurred as Harris criticized Trump's controversial 2019 invitation to Taliban leaders for peace talks at Camp David, bypassing the Afghan government. Her visible frustration became a focal point for online discussions.

title: Elon Musk labels Australia's government 'fascists' over proposed misinformation fines
content: Elon Musk labeled Australia's center-left government as 'fascists' after it proposed fines for internet platforms failing to curb misinformation. The new law mandates platforms to establish codes of conduct or face penalties, aiming for greater transparency and accountability. This has ignited criticism and debate among Australian lawmakers.
summary: Elon Musk labeled Australia's center-left government as 'fascists' after it proposed fines for internet platforms failing to curb misinformation. The new law mandates platforms to establish codes of conduct or face penalties, aiming for greater transparency and accountability. This has ignited criticism and debate among Australian lawmakers.

title: Greenland landslide causes 9-day earthquake-like tremors: Study
content: Scientists traced an unusual seismic signal from last September to a significant landslide in East Greenland's Dickson Fjord. The collapse of a mountain sent part of a glacier into the water, causing a 200-meter-high mega-tsunami that lasted nine days. This incident highlights the influence of climate change on geological phenomena.
summary: Scientists traced an unusual seismic signal from last September to a significant landslide in East Greenland's Dickson Fjord. The collapse of a mountain sent part of a glacier into the water, causing a 200-meter-high mega-tsunami that lasted nine days. This incident highlights the influence of climate change on geological phenomena.

title: Tim Walz rides Taylor Swift's support to fire back at JD Vance: 'You mess with cat people ...'
content: Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate, took a jab at JD Vance for his 'childless cat ladies' remarks. Pop star Taylor Swift endorsed Harris and Walz on Instagram. Walz thanked Swift for her support and highlighted the influence of cat owners in politics. Vance had previously criticized Democrats for being led by childless individuals.
summary: Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate, took a jab at JD Vance for his 'childless cat ladies' remarks. Pop star Taylor Swift endorsed Harris and Walz on Instagram. Walz thanked Swift for her support and highlighted the influence of cat owners in politics. Vance had previously criticized Democrats for being led by childless individuals.

title: When Prince Harry called off his birthday bash at last minute 'due to Kate Middleton'
content: Prince Harry will mark his 40th birthday on Sunday with family and later a getaway with friends. Ten years ago, he postponed his 30th birthday party because of Kate Middleton's severe morning sickness. This year, he plans an international trip with close friends such as Nacho Figueras.
summary: Prince Harry will mark his 40th birthday on Sunday with family and later a getaway with friends. Ten years ago, he postponed his 30th birthday party because of Kate Middleton's severe morning sickness. This year, he plans an international trip with close friends such as Nacho Figueras.

title: Trump extends pet-theft claims: After cats and dogs, Haitian immigrants allegedly stealing geese too
content: Donald Trump has amplified his baseless claims about Haitian immigrants, now accusing them of stealing geese in Springfield, Ohio. The actual disturbance was a bomb threat at City Hall. Local leaders commend Haitian immigrants for their hard work. Trump also criticized Vice President Kamala Harris and spoke about changing voter demographics during his rally.
summary: Donald Trump has amplified his baseless claims about Haitian immigrants, now accusing them of stealing geese in Springfield, Ohio. The actual disturbance was a bomb threat at City Hall. Local leaders commend Haitian immigrants for their hard work. Trump also criticized Vice President Kamala Harris and spoke about changing voter demographics during his rally.

title: Debate fallout: Trump accuses ABC News of bias as Harris campaign pushes for rematch; Mark Penn calls for investigation
content: A contentious debate between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris has sparked allegations of bias from Trump's camp against ABC News. Critics claim Harris received questions in advance, prompting calls for an internal investigation. Connections between Harris and ABC News personnel have further fueled the controversy.
summary: A contentious debate between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris has sparked allegations of bias from Trump's camp against ABC News. Critics claim Harris received questions in advance, prompting calls for an internal investigation. Connections between Harris and ABC News personnel have further fueled the controversy.

title: Ecuador prison chief killed, second this month: Officials
content: Maria Daniela Icaza, director of Ecuador's largest prison, was fatally attacked near Guayaquil. This marks the second killing of a prison director within two weeks. Ecuador's prisons are notorious for gang control and violence. The country has experienced a sharp increase in homicides due to transnational cartels using its ports for drug trafficking.
summary: Maria Daniela Icaza, director of Ecuador's largest prison, was fatally attacked near Guayaquil. This marks the second killing of a prison director within two weeks. Ecuador's prisons are notorious for gang control and violence. The country has experienced a sharp increase in homicides due to transnational cartels using its ports for drug trafficking.

title: White House rebukes Trump over ties to far-right figure Laura Loomer: 'No leader should associate with racist poison'
content: The White House condemned former President Donald Trump for associating with far-right conspiracy theorist Laura Loomer. Known for her incendiary posts, Loomer has been seen accompanying Trump at various events. The White House criticized Loomer's racist comments about Vice President Kamala Harris and called Trump's association with her 'repugnant' and 'un-American.'
summary: The White House condemned former President Donald Trump for associating with far-right conspiracy theorist Laura Loomer. Known for her incendiary posts, Loomer has been seen accompanying Trump at various events. The White House criticized Loomer's racist comments about Vice President Kamala Harris and called Trump's association with her 'repugnant' and 'un-American.'

title: Annapurna Interactive's entire staff resigns, leaving developers scrambling: Report
content: Annapurna Interactive's entire team resigned after failing to reach an agreement on spinning off as an independent entity. Despite this, the company assures support for ongoing projects and aims to expand in the interactive space. Newly appointed president Hector Sanchez promises to fulfill contractual obligations and fill vacant positions.
summary: Annapurna Interactive's entire team resigned after failing to reach an agreement on spinning off as an independent entity. Despite this, the company assures support for ongoing projects and aims to expand in the interactive space. Newly appointed president Hector Sanchez promises to fulfill contractual obligations and fill vacant positions.

title: US elections: Trump declines another presidential debate with Harris, VP says â€˜We owe it to the votersâ€™
content: Donald Trump announced he will not participate in another debate with Kamala Harris, focusing on battleground states before the US presidential election. Despite Harris' request for a second debate, Trump declared himself the winner of their recent face-off. Polls suggest Harris performed better, reflecting her growing momentum.
summary: Donald Trump announced he will not participate in another debate with Kamala Harris, focusing on battleground states before the US presidential election. Despite Harris' request for a second debate, Trump declared himself the winner of their recent face-off. Polls suggest Harris performed better, reflecting her growing momentum.

title: Los Angeles hit by dozens of aftershocks from 4.7 Malibu earthquake
content: A 4.7 magnitude earthquake shook the Los Angeles area with its epicenter near Malibu, followed by more than two dozen aftershocks. The region is simultaneously dealing with three major wildfires east of Los Angeles. Despite intense shaking felt by residents, no significant damage was reported.
summary: A 4.7 magnitude earthquake shook the Los Angeles area with its epicenter near Malibu, followed by more than two dozen aftershocks. The region is simultaneously dealing with three major wildfires east of Los Angeles. Despite intense shaking felt by residents, no significant damage was reported.

title: White House calls out Trump for 'filthy' lies about haitian migrants eating pets: 'Lives are in danger'
content: The White House has sharply criticized former President Donald Trump for spreading false stories about Haitian migrants in Ohio eating pet cats and dogs. Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre denounced the claims as dangerous misinformation that endangers migrant communities. These narratives have been debunked by local authorities, raising concerns about their impact on public perception and safety.
summary: The White House has sharply criticized former President Donald Trump for spreading false stories about Haitian migrants in Ohio eating pet cats and dogs. Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre denounced the claims as dangerous misinformation that endangers migrant communities. These narratives have been debunked by local authorities, raising concerns about their impact on public perception and safety.

title: US elections 2024: Kamala Harris widens lead over Donald Trump after presidential debate showdown, polls show
content: Vice President Kamala Harris has surged ahead of former President Donald Trump after their Philadelphia debate, leading 47% to 42% in a Reuters/Ipsos poll. The debate was marked by sharp exchanges, with Harris pressing Trump on his fitness for office and legal issues. A CNN flash poll showed 60% of viewers believed Harris dominated the stage.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris has surged ahead of former President Donald Trump after their Philadelphia debate, leading 47% to 42% in a Reuters/Ipsos poll. The debate was marked by sharp exchanges, with Harris pressing Trump on his fitness for office and legal issues. A CNN flash poll showed 60% of viewers believed Harris dominated the stage.

title: Pakistan stand-off over cops seeking army exit from restive province drags on
content: In northwestern Pakistan, police units are striking to demand the withdrawal of military and intelligence agencies from their region. They accuse these forces of interfering in their duties and worsening security conditions. The protest has led to blocked highways and increased tensions, with no signs of resolution so far.
summary: In northwestern Pakistan, police units are striking to demand the withdrawal of military and intelligence agencies from their region. They accuse these forces of interfering in their duties and worsening security conditions. The protest has led to blocked highways and increased tensions, with no signs of resolution so far.

title: Donald Trump says there will be no third debate, Kamala wants one because...
content: Donald Trump stated he will not engage in another debate with Kamala Harris, referencing a poll indicating his victory. He criticized ABC moderators for perceived bias. While Harris's campaign seeks another debate in October, Trump's team maintains they have already agreed to three debates, questioning the need for more. Donald Trump debated with President Joe Biden on CNN which was the first debate of this presidential election.
summary: Donald Trump stated he will not engage in another debate with Kamala Harris, referencing a poll indicating his victory. He criticized ABC moderators for perceived bias. While Harris's campaign seeks another debate in October, Trump's team maintains they have already agreed to three debates, questioning the need for more. Donald Trump debated with President Joe Biden on CNN which was the first debate of this presidential election.

title: Bush's attorney general says 'I can't sit quietly', endorses Kamala Harris
content: Gonzales said he spoke with Trump only once and does not really know him. "It is telling, however, that several senior officials who worked for him in the White House now refuse to support him, including his vice president, chief of staff, defense secretary and national security adviser. Their unwillingness to endorse their former boss is an indictment of his character at a level equal to his many, many criminal indictments," he wrote.
summary: Gonzales said he spoke with Trump only once and does not really know him. "It is telling, however, that several senior officials who worked for him in the White House now refuse to support him, including his vice president, chief of staff, defense secretary and national security adviser. Their unwillingness to endorse their former boss is an indictment of his character at a level equal to his many, many criminal indictments," he wrote.

title: In the (y)ear of conspiracy theories, Trump hears insults galore
content: Kamala Harris decisively outperformed Donald Trump in the presidential debate, sparking baseless conspiracy theories among MAGA supporters. Despite Trump's insistence on winning, consensus points to his defeat. Celebrity endorsements for Harris and criticism from notable figures have weakened Trump's campaign, with even some Republicans questioning his capability to be in office.
summary: Kamala Harris decisively outperformed Donald Trump in the presidential debate, sparking baseless conspiracy theories among MAGA supporters. Despite Trump's insistence on winning, consensus points to his defeat. Celebrity endorsements for Harris and criticism from notable figures have weakened Trump's campaign, with even some Republicans questioning his capability to be in office.
